pizza.message

Class ConfirmationMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizza.message.PizzaMessage
      • pizza.message.ConfirmationMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConfirmationMessage
extends PizzaMessage
    Itemized total bill for a pizza order, including a description and price of each item in the order plus sales tax and total.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    4
    <Representation of first confirmation item>
    ...
    <Representation of last confirmation item>
    (Empty line)
    Sales tax: <sales tax amount>
    Order total amount: <total amount>
    END
    See documentation of ConfirmationItem for its representation. Note that the first line of this representation contains the message type, as per the PizzaMessage documentation.
    Author:
    drdan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
